ISSUE.TITLE: add basic polling and loading for output panel
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### SUMMARY This issue is for adding a basic polling function to the output component along with a 'loading' panel. related: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/4224#issue-462864888

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4464 from ryanpetrello/named-url-vuln-372 update the named URL code to properly return 404 vs 403

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4477 from ryanpetrello/372-signal-deadlock force worker processes to have a different signal handler from the parent
